name: Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 3
name_original: Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 3
description:
Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 3 is an action-RPG game developed by Alfa System. It came out on 10-02-2011. Namco published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology 3 on PSP.
It was scored by Go Shiina, Kazuhiro Nakamura, Kota Nakashima and Motoi Sakuraba.
